alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Coweta; Fayette; Heard; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 8:35AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fayette, southeastern Carroll, north central Heard, northern Coweta and southwestern Fulton Counties through 900 AM EDT... At 835 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Clem, or near Carrollton, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Newnan, Carrollton, Fayetteville, Peachtree City, Tyrone, Palmetto, Whitesburg, Roopville, Plant Yates, Byers Crossroads, Arnco-Sargent, Seaton Lake, Dunaway Gardens, Clem, Cannongate, Lowell, Plant Wansley, Roscoe, Thomas Crossroads and Madras. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EDT for northwestern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Coweta; Fayette; Heard; South Fulton
